column3: Please rate the extent to which you agree with each of the statement below regarding your experience as a faculty member in the School of Engineering.  Note that this set of questions refers to your experience in the School of Engineering, while a second set of questions will refer to your particular department.  . If you are a newer faculty member, please respond based on your experience so far or use “n/a” if you don’t have enough experience yet to be sure about your answer.
column17: Please rate the extent to which you agree with each of the statement below regarding your experience as a faculty member IN YOUR PARTICULAR DEPARTMENT.

column3: I have opportunities to voice my opinion about policies and procedures affecting the School of Engineering.
column4: I have opportunities to have input into decisions that impact the School.
column5: School leadership communicates about the rationale for decisions.
column7: I am familiar with the priorities in our current School of Engineering strategic plan.
column8: I have an updated sense of where the School of Engineering is in implementing our strategic plan.
column9: I am satisfied with the overall direction of the School of Engineering.
column10: There is an open system of communication between faculty and administration in the School of Engineering.
column11: Our system of shared governance is effective.
column12: The leadership of the School of Engineering is effective.
column13: Overall, I am satisfied with the leadership of the School of Engineering.
column14: I would recommend the School of Engineering as a good place to work.
column15: Faculty in the School of Engineering have collegial relationships.
column16: Faculty receive appreciation and recognition for their accomplishments.
column17: I have opportunities to voice my opinion about decisions affecting my department.
column18: My department chair shares relevant information with faculty in our department.
column19: I am familiar with strategic goals and priorities for our department.
column20: Leadership in my department is effective.
column21: I would recommend my department as a good place to work.
column22: Faculty in my department have collegial relationships.
